name: Season Match Puzzle Adventure
description:
Welcome to Season Match Puzzle Adventure!

Encounter great characters, enjoy a plot full of unexpected twists, and restore the magical kingdoms after the attack of the evil Crow Witch by clearing gorgeous match-3 levels!

Game features:
- Unique gameplay: swap and match your way through an interesting storyline
- Hundreds of original levels with fun, engaging gameplay
- Explore a stunning magical world and make friends with its unique characters. Meet them all!
- Dozens of unique amulets to improve your abilities!
- A multitude of Magic Kingdoms, each with its own history
- Upgrade each kingdom's fountains and flowerbeds to get additional bonuses
- Exciting game events to challenge even the most experienced players!
- Play Season Match with your Facebook friends. Conquer them all!
- Synchronized game progress across all your devices
- Play even without an Internet connection!
- Runs smoothly even on slower devices

Season Match Puzzle Adventure is a completely free game. You can beat all of the levels without any additional purchases. Or, you can buy extra lives, moves, and bonuses to pull off the most impressive wins!
